name: api-storage
description: Minimal Express API for file storage with Backblaze B2

scripts.key:disable: test -f src/scripts/manage-keys.ts && node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/manage-keys.ts disable || node dist/scripts/manage-keys.js disable
scripts.key:enable: test -f src/scripts/manage-keys.ts && node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/manage-keys.ts enable || node dist/scripts/manage-keys.js enable
scripts.key:delete: test -f src/scripts/manage-keys.ts && node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/manage-keys.ts delete || node dist/scripts/manage-keys.js delete
scripts.key:help: test -f src/scripts/manage-keys.ts && node --loader ts-node/esm src/scripts/manage-keys.ts help || node dist/scripts/manage-keys.js help
